query:
SELECT 
        id.image_id AS source,
        vr.cve_id AS target
    FROM 
        digest_to_vulnerability dtv
    JOIN 
        image_details id ON dtv.digest = id.digest
    JOIN 
        vulnerability_record vr ON dtv.vulnerability_id = vr.id
    ORDER BY 
        id.image_id
    LIMIT 10;
